div.p: This code system http://moh.fhir.org/moh-hcim/CodeSystem/bc-client-registry-address-validation-code-system defines the following codes:

tr.td: The address is valid, i.e. there is a reasonable good chance this address is known by Canada Post.
The address validation status is invalid and like not recognized by Canada Post.
The address validation status is unknown.

title.value: BC Client Registry address validation status code

description.value: Codes used to define the address validation status.

definition.value: The address is valid, i.e. there is a reasonable good chance this address is known by Canada Post.
The address validation status is invalid and like not recognized by Canada Post.
The address validation status is unknown.
